eligible.translation[0].definitions[0].d: someone who is eligible for something is able or allowed to do it, for example because they are the right age
eligible.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Students on a part-time course are not eligible for a loan.
Over 500,000 18-year-olds will become eligible to vote this year.
eligible.translation[0].definitions[1].d: an eligible man or woman would be good to marry because they are rich, attractive, and not married
eligible.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Stephen was regarded as an eligible bachelor.
eligible.translation[1].definitions[0].d: allowed to do something or receive something
eligible.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Are you eligible for social security benefits?
